name: Responsive-table-js
tagline: Responsive Tables JS is a simple and fast method for making any table responsive
body:
Responsive Table JS =================== Responsive Tables JS is a simple and fast method for making any table responsive Usage ------ * jQuery is required - tested with 2.x (should work with previous versions too) * Just insert the js script and add the class **responsive** to your table. * The table must have **th** tags to work **Example:** Include: Table:
Title 1 Title 2
Row 1 Row 1
Contribution ------------ Sure! Just send my your pull requests :) [Demo] ---- Licence ------- MIT [Demo]:demo.html
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
